00023 #include "pvector_unsafe.hpp"
00024 
00025 namespace uStreamLib {
00026         PVectorUnsafe::PVectorUnsafe(void)
00027                 : Object(UOSUTIL_RTTI_PVECTOR_UNSAFE), m_vpPtrs(NULL), m_uSize(0),
00028                 m_uCount(0), m_uIncrement(0), m_comp(NULL)
00029         {
00030                 // nothing to do
00031         }
00032 
00033         PVectorUnsafe::~PVectorUnsafe(void)
00034         {
00035                 // free memory
00036                 if (m_vpPtrs) {
00037                         ::free(m_vpPtrs);
00038                         m_vpPtrs = NULL;
00039                 }
00040 
00041                 m_uCount = 0;
00042                 m_uSize = 0;
00043                 m_uIncrement = 0;
00044         }
00045 
00046         int32 PVectorUnsafe::init(uint32 init_size, uint32 incr)
00047         {
00048                 // initialize pointers array
00049                 m_vpPtrs = (void * *) ::malloc(init_size * sizeof(void *));
00050                 if (!m_vpPtrs)
00051                         return FAILURE;
00052 
00053                 // zeroize buffer
00054                 ::memset(m_vpPtrs, 0, init_size * sizeof(void *));
00055 
00056                 // initialize members
00057                 m_uCount = 0;
00058                 m_uSize = init_size;
00059                 m_uIncrement = incr;
00060 
00061                 // everything is ok
00062                 setOk(true);
00063                 return SUCCESS;
00064         }
00065 
00066         int32 PVectorUnsafe::add(void* ptr)
00067         {
00068                 if (m_uCount >= m_uSize) {
00069                         uint32 new_size = m_uSize + m_uIncrement;
00070 
00071                         m_vpPtrs = (void * *) ::realloc(m_vpPtrs,
00072                                                                         new_size * sizeof(void *));
00073                         if (!m_vpPtrs)
00074                                 return FAILURE;
00075 
00076                         ::memset(&m_vpPtrs[m_uSize], 0, m_uIncrement * sizeof(void *));
00077 
00078                         m_uSize = new_size;
00079                 }
00080 
00081                 m_vpPtrs[m_uCount] = ptr;
00082                 m_uCount += 1;
00083 
00084                 // ok
00085                 return (m_uCount - 1);
00086         }
00087 
00088         int32 PVectorUnsafe::del(uint32 idx)
00089         {
00090                 if (idx >= m_uCount)
00091                         return FAILURE;
00092 
00093                 for (uint32 j = idx; j < m_uCount - 1; j++)
00094                         m_vpPtrs[j] = m_vpPtrs[j + 1];
00095 
00096                 m_uCount -= 1;
00097                 return SUCCESS;
00098         }
00099 
00100         int32 PVectorUnsafe::set(uint32 idx, void* ptr)
00101         {
00102                 if (idx >= m_uCount)
00103                         return FAILURE;
00104 
00105                 m_vpPtrs[idx] = ptr;
00106                 return SUCCESS;
00107         }
00108 
00109         void* PVectorUnsafe::operator[](uint32 idx)
00110         {
00111                 return (idx < m_uCount ? m_vpPtrs[idx] : NULL);
00112         }
00113 
00114         void PVectorUnsafe::clear(void)
00115         {
00116                 ::memset(m_vpPtrs, 0, m_uSize * sizeof(void *));
00117                 m_uCount = 0;
00118         }
00119 
00120         uint32 PVectorUnsafe::getSize(void)
00121         {
00122                 return m_uSize;
00123         }
00124 
00125         uint32 PVectorUnsafe::getCount(void)
00126         {
00127                 return m_uCount;
00128         }
00129 
00130         uint32 PVectorUnsafe::getIncrement(void)
00131         {
00132                 return m_uIncrement;
00133         }
00134 
00135         void PVectorUnsafe::sort(void)
00136         {
00137                 _quickSort(0, getCount() - 1, getComparator());
00138         }
00139 
00140         void PVectorUnsafe::_quickSort(int32 s, int32 d, Comparator* c)
00141         {
00142                 div_t pos = div(s + d, 2);
00143                 int32 ret = 0;
00144 
00145                 int32 i = s;
00146                 int32 j = d;
00147 
00148                 void* vX = m_vpPtrs[pos.quot];
00149                 if (!vX)
00150                         return;
00151 
00152                 do {
00153                         void* vI = NULL;
00154                         void* vJ = NULL;
00155 
00156                         while (1) {
00157                                 vI = m_vpPtrs[i];
00158                                 if (vI) {
00159                                         ret = c->compare(vI, 0, vX, 0);
00160                                         if (ret >= 0)
00161                                                 break;
00162                                 }
00163 
00164                                 i++;
00165                         }
00166 
00167                         while (1) {
00168                                 vJ = m_vpPtrs[j];
00169                                 if (vJ) {
00170                                         ret = c->compare(vX, 0, vJ, 0);
00171                                         if (ret >= 0)
00172                                                 break;
00173                                 }
00174 
00175                                 j--;
00176                         }
00177 
00178                         if (i <= j) {
00179                                 set(i, vJ);
00180                                 set(j, vI);
00181 
00182                                 i++;
00183                                 j--;
00184                         }
00185                 } while (i <= j);
00186 
00187                 if (s < j)
00188                         _quickSort(s, j, c);
00189                 if (i < d)
00190                         _quickSort(i, d, c);
00191         }
00192 }
